resources.string: Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map.

This sample requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Go4Lunch\'.
Location permission is required for this demo.
Access to the call phone service is required to demonstrate the \'call phone\' feature, which allows you to call the restaurant from the app.
Call phone permission is required for this demo.

This sample requires call phone permission to enable the \'call phone\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Go4Lunch\'.
